description.message: Install extensions from Chrome Web Store.

installerErrorNetwork.message:
Unable to download extension package due the network error.

Check your internet connection and try again.

installerErrorTimeout.message:
Downloading timeout reached. It is most often caused by slow or unstable internet connection.

Wait a while or try one more time.

installerFinalize.message: To complete installation, go to extensions manager and confirm installation by clicking install button.

installerFinalizeMayWork.message:
To complete installation, go to extensions manager and confirm installation by clicking install button.

[Compatibility notice]
Please, be aware that this extension requires APIs that aren't fully supported in Opera.
It still can work in Opera, so complete installation to verify.

installerFinalizeNotSupported.message:
To complete installation, go to extensions manager and confirm installation by clicking install button.

[Compatibility notice]
Please, be aware that this extension requires APIs that are not supported in Opera.
It still can work in Opera, so complete installation to verify.

installerNotSupportedApp.message:
You are trying to install an APP.

Opera doesn't support apps. Only EXTENSIONS can be installed.

installerNotSupportedTheme.message:
You are trying to install a THEME.

Opera doesn't support chromium theme format. Only EXTENSIONS can be installed.

welcomeYandex.message: Thank you for installing this extension but Yandex browser users don't need it. Your browser supports chrome web store by default. Just go there and try yourself.
